revised_title: Spectroscopic Observations of the Sun: Further Discoveries and Insights
tldr: The author, J. Herschel, continues his spectroscopic observations of the sun and discovers new solar lines and phenomena. He describes the appearance of solar prominences and the behavior of solar lines, including a new line he christens "S." He also discusses the possibility of observing the actual forms of solar clouds and the potential for further discoveries in solar spectroscopy.
